subject: My 1st test session = tonight & tomorow!
author: judy_in_hollywood
full_text: Hi Frank & All,  I am feeling it's the right time for me to do my 1st test session with the RS Hack, so, it's about 8:50 pm (L.A. time) and I'm thinking at about 10 PM (L.A. time) to tune-in and record whatever wants to come to be recorded.  I hope some of you (i.e. Bruce) will let the entities/Spirits know that I will be testing in about an hour from now! Thanks!! =Judy=
